titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to "Problems and Procedures of Demonstrating the Presence of an Early Assemblage at the Little's Landing Site," by Michael G. Avey 1972

titlestmt.author: Cheryl Gunselman

publicationstmt.publisher: Manuscripts, Archives, and Special Collections, Washington State University Libraries

did.unittitle: "Problems and Procedures of Demonstrating the Presence of an Early Assemblage at the Little's Landing Site," by Michael G. Avey
did.abstract: This collection consists of a single item: "Problems and Procedures of Demonstrating the Presence of an Early Assemblage at the Little's Landing Site," by Michael G. Avey (master's thesis for M.A. in Anthropology, Washington State University; photocopy).

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a single item: "Problems and Procedures of Demonstrating the Presence of an Early Assemblage at the Little's Landing Site," by Michael G. Avey (master's thesis for M.A. in Anthropology, Washington State University; photocopy).

accessrestrict.p: This collection is open and available for research use.

processinfo.p: Cheryl Gunselman processed this collection in 2018.

acqinfo.p: The Washington State University Department of Anthropology transferred this collection in 1990 (MS.1990.19).

prefercite.p: Avey, Michael G. "Problems and Procedures of Demonstrating the Presence of an Early Assemblage at the Little's Landing Site" (master's thesis); Manuscripts, Archives, and Special Collections; Washington State University Libraries.
